oai_dc:dc.dc:contributor: The New Digital Bleek and Lloyd Archive
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: !nanni (XI)
Tamme (XII)
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: !nanni and|or Tamme give the names of plants and animals found in their country, as well as other words and sentences from their daily life. 1) There is a drawing dated 17 March 1881 inserted between pp.9799v and 9800. It is by !nanni (!) as well as Tamme (T.) and features what appear to be plants called !korubo, 2) This story is found in Book XI & XII-10.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Lucy Lloyd !kun notebooks
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Words and sentences: plants and animals
